entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 12:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 6.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia early in the morning. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
